This guide will show you how to:

::: {.intro-div}

- Install [oh-my-zsh][oh-my-zsh].
- Install git, auto-suggestion, and syntax highlighting plugins.
- Modify your `oh-my-zsh` theme.

:::

As a prerequisite, must have [zsh][zsh] installed before installing and using `oh-my-zsh`. [git][git-install] is also an optional prerequisite.
